text: Paul M W Benz, OAM (born 9 January 1986) is an athlete with a disability from Australia. He competes in a wheelchair. He won a gold medal at the 2004 Summer Paralympics in the Men's 4 Ã— 100 m T35-38 race. == References == Category:Australian athletes Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Australia Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:2004 Summer Paralympics
title: Paul Benz
